title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 2 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is gradually decreasing from 2016 to 2011.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2011.
Max Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 2.9 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 1.45 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars with a total of 2 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2016.
